com.alexgilleran.icesoap.request.impl

Class HUCSOAPRequester

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alexgilleran.icesoap.request.impl.HUCSOAPRequester
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SOAPRequester

    public class HUCSOAPRequester
extends Object
implements SOAPRequester
    Implementation of SOAPRequester that uses HttpURLConnection

      • buildHttpUrlConnection

        protected HttpURLConnection buildHttpUrlConnection(URL url)
                                            throws IOException
        Builds an HttpURLConnection from the required URL. By default simply uses URL.openConnection() and and casts to HttpURLConnection. Override this method in order to perform more advanced operations like casting to HttpsURLConnection and providing your own socket factories to accept self-signed certificates, or only accept pinned certificates.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to open a connection for.
        Returns:
        The opened connection.
        Throws:
        IOException - If some kind of I/O error happens while establishing the connection.

      • setConnectionTimeout

        public void setConnectionTimeout(int timeout)
        Description copied from interface: SOAPRequester
        Set the timeout for making connections to the server.
        Specified by:
        setConnectionTimeout in interface SOAPRequester
        Parameters:
        timeout - Timeout time in milliseconds.

      • setSocketTimeout

        public void setSocketTimeout(int timeout)
        Description copied from interface: SOAPRequester
        Set the timeout for receiving data from the server - note that this takes into account time to establish a connection, send the envelope, wait for the server to process and then receive it.
        Specified by:
        setSocketTimeout in interface SOAPRequester
        Parameters:
        timeout - Timeout time in milliseconds.
